column2: Android library (AAR). Highly configurable, easily extendable deep zoom view for displaying huge images without loss of detail. Perfect for photo galleries, maps, building plans etc.

column5:
Merge pull request #403 from sfeatherstone/master

Added @Nullable and @NonNull annotations for Kotlin use

- Added @Nullable and @NonNull annotations for better Kotlin compatibility.

- Suppressed lint warnings caused by Annotations.

Merge pull request #387 from jitenderdev/patch-1

Update README.md
One more attempt at getting travis to work
Trying to get Travis to build
Dropped timestamps from javadoc for cleaner history
Eager tile loading enabled by default
Add link to kotlin sample app
Simple global bitmap config with a static field
Simpler synchronization to prevent isReady call during recycling
Restored enforced synchronization on BitmapRegionDecoder for SDK < 21, which did not have internal synchronization
Experimental decoder using a pool of BitmapRegionDecoder instances to provide parallel tile loading
Eager loading option loads tiles during anim/gestures
Allow a custom and dedicated executor to be used for tile loading
Use ReadWriteLock to delegate synchronization to decoder classes while allowing safe recycling
Use ReadWriteLock to allow multiple threads to decode tiles while preventing simultaneous recycling
Moved sample to different package name to avoid conflict with Play store version
Default image quality capped at 320dpi to reduce memory use
#298 Expose remaining pan available. Allows activities and subclasses to determine whether pan limit has been reached in each direction.
#273 #295 Support for setting minimum scale so image fills view and top left corner is shown first - SCALE_TYPE_START
#284 Always interpret double tap as zoom in when at minimum scale
#331 Added methods to convert screen coordinates to file coordinates, to simplify extracting the visible area from an image.
#282 Moved to EXIF support library. Minimum SDK changed 10 -> 14.
#344 Guard against null vFocusStart in animation

I want to be able to remove the OnStateChangedListener in onScaleChanged. This caused a NPE in `sendStateChanged()` when `onCenterChanged()` was called.
Include proguard rules to stop removal of default constructors

Load base layer before onDraw if maxTileDimensions are set #127

readme: Update Clover icon & link
readme: Update Clover icon & link We're on F-Droid now. An tag is used because we scale the 192x192 icon down to 100x100.

Merge pull request #222 from laurencedawson/patch-1

Added an extra event to notify when the SubsamplingScaleImageView has finished using the preview bitmap

Added an extra event to notify when the SubsamplingScaleImageView has finished using the preview bitmap

In the case where setImage() is called using ImageSource.cachedBitmap() I found it to be handy to know when the SubsamplingScaleImageView has finished using the cached bitmap.

In my app I have started to aggressively reuse bitmaps after reading [this article](http://blog.booking.com/android-reuse-bitmaps.html). Having this extra callback allows me to mark the bitmap as no longer in use and free for reuse.

This might be a little niche but I figured it was worth submitting!

Cheers
Laurence

Merge pull request #129 from ulyssesp/master

Use getRequiredRotation() for non-tiled images

Use getRequiredRotation() for non-tiled images

The current version uses `getOrientation()` which is -1 if
ORIENTATION_USE_EXIF is set. Rotating the image by -1 is bad.
If the whole image is required at native resolution, use BitmapDecoder to decode it for better image format support
#120 Option to use AsyncTask.THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR to load tiles
#114 If file does not exist, try URL decoding it to allow for URIs created using Uri.fromFile
Skip loading of tiles that have gone off screen while queued for loading
Fix for #110 - avoid recycling cached bitmap
Support EXIF rotation for content URIs

Merge pull request #60 from mcginty/factory

Use factory pattern for ImageDecoder and ImageRegionDecoder
Restored matrix tile rotation using setPolyToPoly to eliminate rounding errors that caused apps. Fixed a few leftover bits from recent refactoring.
Reverted matrix rotation of tiles, restricted tile size to 2048 to allow memory for rotation
Modified tile map to allow for images close to a multiple of the max bitmap size
#49 Removed bitmap dithering to solve moire patterns
#48 Use a matrix to rotate tiles so no need to use extra memory creating a rotated copy
Corrected a mistake with full size bitmap region display
Updated version to 3.0.0 and added new features
Restored quick scale setting and added an XML attribute for it
Restored quick scale setting and added an XML attribute for it
Added quick scale to basic feature tour
Demo pan disabled and fixed centre
Removed demo preview image, revised image source method names
Large images with many tiles were being cropped slightly
Merge region display into preview-image branch and implement for full size bitmaps and preview images
Merge region display into preview-image branch and implement for full size bitmaps and preview images
Fixed subclass callbacks and default listener class

Merge pull request #46 from t101d/display_region

Add display region.
Fixed double tap zoom bug with panning disabled zooming in on the tapped point instead of the center
Fixed an issue with requested centre point after size change
Cleaner method of supplying a drawable ID, no need for context. Restored overridable event methods for subclasses.
Initial commit for #37. Preview image support, combined two classes into one, refactored image source.
#41 No objects allocated in onDraw and onTouchEvent. General cleanup.
Added sync for reddit to HOF
Minor coding style changes for quick scale
Whoops! Add accessor functions to ScaleImageView
#39 Image is initially scaled to fit inside the padding box and scales to the full view size
#39 Resolved an issue with setMinimumScaleType(CUSTOM) causing center to be set to NaN.
Stop logging warnings for EXIF rotation undefined
Updated RapidDecoder and completed implementation of decoder interface for both classes
Sample app set up to demonstrate problems with JPG decoding
Extracted bitmap decoding to an interface to allow custom implementations. Added demo for RapidDecoder. Support display from resources. General cleanup.
Release 2.2.1: Fixes pom. Updated readme with maven instructions.
Improved edge swipe detection for view pager galleries
Gradle configuration for central repository deployment
Ported min scale PR into ScaleImageView

Merge pull request #28 from alfredopenaalonso/master

Added minScale
Version incremented for new sample app build
Demo PNG changed to indexed color
Image changed to RGB due to lack of support for grayscale in lollipop.
Option to set a solid background color behind tiles for transparent PNGs, leaving the black bars (showing the view's background) when the image doesn't fill the view.
#18 - Support minimum scale type based on ImageView.ScaleType - CENTER_CROP.
Hack fix for #15 - reset gesture detector after double tap so next fling is detected.
Early version of ScaleImageView, which supports display of Bitmap objects and resources but doesn't subsample or tile.
Solved a problem with intermittent garbage collection of decoder before it can be used.
Link to sample app on Play
Tile sizes now loosely based on screen size to better support wide/tall images
Option to set threshold DPI for loading higher quality tiles
Improved handling of zoom gestures at minimum zoom for new pan limit types
Abort loading of tiles that have moved off screen since loading task was submitted. Notes on PNG alpha channel forcing ARGB_8888 and causing OOMEs.

Merge pull request #9 from kyze8439690/master

add gradle support
Modified animations so the last frame is always reached
Density aware scaling methods. Made various methods that may be used internally final.
Double tap to zoom in and out
Double tap to zoom in and out
Options to disable pan and zoom gestures
Support XML definition of asset name
Better and simplified support for state restore on rotate
Make sure bitmaps are recycled on reset
When available, use Canvas methods to determine max bitmap size
Public ready, width, height and orientation methods
Don't null onTouchListener, now this class no longer implements it.
Implemented onMeasure so using wrap_content will result in the view's aspect ratio matching that of the image it's displaying.
Send onImageReady off UI thread to avoid blocks
Fixed a bug in bounds detection for tall images
Handle view resize by resetting scale and center. This can be overridden to implement alternative behaviour.
Support for click and long click listeners, and use within a view pager
Refactored to very basic library + sample structure
Support manual or EXIF rotation of images
Change demo to store floats instead of point on save state
Check for null translate when returning center
Removed SERIAL_EXECUTOR uses and rely on synchronisation for single threaded tile loading (no option for this in API 10)
Demo of restoring scale/center on rotate
Tile 2D array flattened to a list
